类的使用
CardList

    • <Unnamed>中CardList的使用

      <Unnamed>中CardList的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BigTwoDeck
      This is used to model a deck of cards used in a Big Two card game
      class  Deck
      This class is used to represent a deck of cards in general card games.
      class  Flush
      This is used to model a hand of Flush.
      class  FullHouse
      This is used to model a hand of FullHouse.
      class  Hand
      This class is used to model a hand of cards, and contains methods for getting the player of this hand, checking if it is a valid hand, getting the type of this hand, getting the top card of this hand, and checking if it beats a specified hand.
      class  Pair
      This is used to model a hand of Pair.
      class  Quad
      This is used to model a hand of Quad.
      class  Single
      This is used to model a hand of Single.
      class  Straight
      This is used to model a hand of Straight.
      class  StraightFlush
      This is used to model a hand of Straight Flush.
      class  Triple
      This is used to model a hand of Triple.
      返回CardList的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      CardList CardGamePlayer.getCardsInHand()
      Returns the list of cards held by this player.
      CardList CardGamePlayer.play(int[] cardIdx)
      Returns the list of cards played by this player.
      参数类型为CardList的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Hand BigTwoClient.composeHand(CardGamePlayer player, CardList cards)
      A method for returning a valid hand from the specified list of cards of the player
      void CardGamePlayer.removeCards(CardList cards)
      Removes the list of cards from this player, if they are held by this player.
